item.title: Hello World!
item.description: Hello, friend. How are you? I’m fine and I expect that you are fine too. So… this is my blog! ðŸŽ‰ðŸŽ‰ðŸŽ‰ Yep! You are in it. I hope that you will have good moments and nice readings here. About what I’ll write? Hmmm… about everything, I think. You can hope to find subjects about technologies, histories from how I learn something. Example: sometimes I have a trouble in my Linux and I search all over the internet to find a solution.
